abstract: A group of international and regional banks met with Dubai World for the first time Monday, as talks began on the company’s efforts to restructure $26 billion of debt, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: A group of international and regional banks met with Dubai World for the first time Monday, as talks began on the company’s efforts to restructure $26 billion of debt, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: A group of international and regional banks met with Dubai World on Monday, as talks began on the company’s efforts to restructure $26 billion of debt, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Group of Banks Said to Meet With Dubai World
